doc.after: Orthopedic surgery is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system Orthopedic surgeons use both surgical and nonsurgical means to treat musculoskeletal injuries sports injuries degenerative diseases infections bone tumours and congenital limb deformities Trauma surgery and traumatology is a sub specialty dealing with the operative management of fractures major trauma and the multiply injured patient
